OpenTCP API documentation

1.0.4

Introduction to OpenTCP

OpenTCP is an Open Source project that brings a high-quality TCP/IP stack to embedded systems. Entirely written in C, it allows easy porting to any existing microcontroller platform for which a C compiler is available.
